metadata.synopsis: Blackboard in front of the Steel Watcher guarding the entrance bridge of Wyrm's Rock Fortress
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Go to 14; 51; 161- click on the blackboard

0.speaker: Narrator
0.text: *Steel Watchers in operation during the coronation of Lord Gortash. Please refrain from criminal activity, and be courteous to the Flaming Fists.*
